channel.title: Dwarf remains
channel.description: Dwarf remains are located on all equip slots. ParseInt error at the loadgame area, server sided client file. Logging in with client provided, so shudnt be a client issue.

item.title: Dwarf remains
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

This can be caused by not setting player equipment upon initialization of a new player. I believe the default ID the client puts in each equipment slot is the Dwarf remains. So by not setting player equipment, the client just puts the Dwarf remains.

Read full topic

item.title: Dwarf remains
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

If its delta, go into player.java and delete all the items that are equipted.

Read full topic
